statements: UPDATE inventory SET item_name='Laptop', quantity=10, price=1500.00 WHERE id=1;

UPDATE sales_transactions SET total_price = CASE WHEN quantity_sold > 5 THEN total_price * 0.9 ELSE total_price * 1.2 END, quantity_sold = CASE WHEN quantity_sold > 5 THEN quantity_sold + 1 ELSE quantity_sold - 1 END WHERE transaction_date <= '2022-09-30';
